mapper.select: select count(*) from profiles_rights where ref_profile = #{id}

select profiles_rights.ref_profile, profiles_rights.ref_right,
rights.code as right_code
from profiles_rights
inner join rights on profiles_rights.ref_right = rights.id
where profiles_rights.ref_profile = #{ref_profile}
order by rights.id
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1))

select profiles_rights.ref_profile, profiles_rights.ref_right,
rights.code as right_code
from profiles_rights
inner join rights on profiles_rights.ref_right = rights.id
where profiles_rights.ref_profile = #{ref_profile}

select * from profiles_rights
where ref_right = #{ref_profile} and ref_right = #{ref_right}
